title: Bugsplat 4 times in arow
body:
i'm currently in a match and it keeps bugsplatting. Help please if possible

Update: now its up to 7. Please help.

replies.body: Hey, that sucks!  You might have some bad game files or driver issues failing to render your game, which would result in bugsplats like that.  Take a break from matchmade games for now, and go over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix you up.  I hope that helps!
